message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counteroffer at $9,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a lower price.  While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $10,500.  This still leaves some room for profit, but reflects my desire to make this deal work. What do you say?

Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,000 for the product. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
